Fix email/password login by adding missing Credentials provider to NextAuth

The Credentials provider was imported but never added to the providers array,
causing email/password login attempts to fail silently with "unauthenticated" status.

Changes:

- Implement authorize() function that authenticates against Supabase
- Use supabase.auth.signInWithPassword() to verify credentials
- Return proper user object for NextAuth session
- Add detailed console logging for debugging auth flow

This fixes the issue where users could register and reset passwords successfully
but could not log in with email/password credentials.
